CheckTitle: Check if a Premium support plan is subscribed
Description: Check if a Premium support plan is subscribed.

Recommendation.Text: It is recommended that you subscribe to the AWS Business Support tier or higher for all of your AWS production accounts. If you don't have premium support, you must have an action plan to handle issues which require help from AWS Support. AWS Support provides a mix of tools and technology, people, and programs designed to proactively help you optimize performance, lower costs, and innovate faster.
